title: XP and RP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user us playing Bingo

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user receives 50 XP just for playing 
AND 2 RP for correct tile including free tile
AND max RP should be 50

title: Single Bingo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND User logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played the Bingo contest 
AND got awarded badges
custom_expected:
THEN user should see all the badges on Profile -> Badges section 
AND the badges should also display in the Feed page
AND user should receive a badge modal

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be receive a Single Bingo badge
AND the copy should say 'Single Bingo: Bingo - Be the first fan to get five in a row on your Bingo card and call Bingo'
Note: there is only one person receiving this badge

title: Single Runner-Up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND User logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played the Bingo contest 
AND user got the Single Bingo after the first person who gets Single Bingo
AND got awarded badges
custom_expected:
THEN user should see all the badges on Profile -> Badges section 
AND the badges should also display in the Feed page
AND user should receive a badge modal

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a Single Runner-Up badge
AND the copy should say 'Single Runner-Up: Bingo - Get five in a row on your Bingo card and call Bingo'

AND all people who get bingo after the first person who gets bingo should receive this badge
AND these badges are not associated with any prize

custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND User logged in
custom_steps:

title: Bingo - Contest Results card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played Bingo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Bingo in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble or user's name
* date 
* result copy 'Your Bingo card had # correct tiles'
* 'Bingo' logo
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Bingo card had only one correct tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should read: Your Bingo card had 1 correct tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user got Single Bingo, Diamond, or Blackout
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the copy should be 'Your Bingo card had # correct tiles and you got [Single Bingo/Diamond/Blackout].'
AND the copy should select the highest achievement of three that the user earned. (Single rule only)
